This is an analysis of labor data to predict future labor trends. The majority of the data is from the United States Department of Labor Statistics.

Outline:

1. Retreive the NUMBER labor reports
2. Combine the reports into one time series file
3. Run time series models to predict future numbers
4. Run time series models to predict future changes

For the greater Chicago area, data on Labor Force, Employment (absolute numbers), Unemployment (absolute numbers), and Unemployment Rate can be found at:

https://data.bls.gov/timeseries/LAUDV171697400000006?amp%253bdata_tool=XGtable&output_view=data&include_graphs=true

Consumer Price Index:

https://data.bls.gov/timeseries/CUURS23ASA0?amp%253bdata_tool=XGtable&output_view=data&include_graphs=true
